description: '''Christian R&B''' (also known as '''gospel R&B''', '''rhythm & praise music''', and '''R&P''') is a subgenre of [[rhythm and blues]] music consisting of tracks with Christian-based lyrics or by musicians typically known for writing such songs. Music in this genre intends to uplift, entertain, or to give a Christian perspective on a topic. Christian R&B could be considered a subgenre of [[gospel music]], or a cross-genre under both gospel and R&B.
